mapper.update: UPDATE menu AS m JOIN menu AS parent ON m.pid = parent.id SET m.deep = parent.deep + 1 WHERE 1=1 and m.flag = 0;

UPDATE menu AS m JOIN ( SELECT id, IF(EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM menu WHERE pid = sub_m.id), 1, 0) AS has_children FROM menu AS sub_m WHERE 1=1 and sub_m.flag = 0 ) AS subquery ON m.id = subquery.id SET m.has_children = 1 WHERE subquery.has_children = 1;
